name: W2C (Website for Content and Community)
short_description: This is a open standard and utilities for exchange data for websites like network news(NNTP). The W2C project will support for many famous CMS(Content Management System), BBS(Bulliten Board System), and Community Websites, each w2c program is an adapter.
